title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Welcome to roughdata!
text:
Turns out, I do need a blog, and it also turns out having backups of my blog posts is a good idea. So here we are.
That said, this particular recreation of this blog will be done using the Wayback machine because I actually can’t find my old svbtle hosted blog backups. Glad I was worthy for the archiving, Internet Archive
I’ll post the old stuff as I determine its suitability for the Internet.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: About Andrew Fergusson
text: Andrew Fergusson is a Lead Data Scientist at Office for National Statistics. When he’s not banging on about metadata making everyone’s life easier, he’s probably banging the pavement in preparation for the next marathon.

title: About Andrew Fergusson
text:
Education
Open Unversity, Milton Keynes Computing & IT (Computing Science) with Statistics | October 2015 - September 2021

title: About Andrew Fergusson
text:
Experience
Lead Data Scientist | Office for National Statistics | May 2022 - Present
Senior Data Engineer | Office for National Statistics | November 2020 - April 2022
Data Engineer | One Manchester | July 2019 - October 2020
Lead Developer (Data Engineering) | BNY Mellon | December 2013 - June 2019
